Base Url: If you want to request data within a script, a crontab, etc. you need to add the parameter to the API calls URLs that require authentication. This is done trough token_auth param. Please obtain this value from piwik.
基本Url: 如果你想在脚本，crontab等里面请求数据，你需要将该参数加到API调用的需要认证的URL上。这是通过token_auth参数实现的，请从piwik获得该参数值。

Base Url: Secure (HTTPS) url of the site where "Piwik" is installed and publicly available, i.e. http://piwik.myserver.net/. If no HTTPS, then give HTTP.
基本Url: 安装“Piwik”的公开站点的安全（HTTPS）Url，例如：http://piwik.myserver.net/。如果没有HTTPS，就是HTTP。

Base Url: Site ID string provided by "Piwik", i.e. 3.
Url of the site where "Piwik" is installed and publicly available, i.e. http://piwik.myserver.net/.
